description: Lassi meet baklava! This creamy, sweet yet refreshing baklava inspired lassi with pistachios, lemon, cinnamon and dairy-free yogurt is the perfect drink for cooling you down on a warm day. Think of it as an Indian milkshake with a Middle Eastern twist.
name: Baklava Pistachio Lassi
recipeIngredient: 1 cup non dairy milk, (I like oat milk or almond milk )
2 tablespoons raw pistachios, plus more for garnish
1 cup non-dairy yogurt (, I like kite hill plain almond milk yogurt )
1 tablespoon maple syrup or sugar (optional as needed)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the milk, nuts, almond flour and dates to a blender and blend for a minute then let it sit for 5 minutes and then repeat 3 or 4 times until all the nuts are well blended in.
Then add yogurt, lemon zest and cinnamon and blend again.
Taste and adjust flavor, add more maple syrup or sugar if you want it sweeter and blend again.
Then pour it over in glasses at least 1/2 filled with ice cubes and serve. Optionally top the lassi with some chopped pistachios.
This makes a really thick lassi. You can add ice cubes to the mixture when you add yogurt to blend some in so that it becomes a little lighter.
